channel.title: Java error? Help please its the only thing that I need help with
channel.description:
Ok my server was working and all but now..its not for people,
When my server is up it says that my server is accepting connections but then it says this Exception in thread "thread-0" Java.Lang.OutOfMemory: Java heap space
..Please help..[br][size=1]Posted at: November 07, 2006, 11:56:06 AM[/size][hr]bump, please anyone..

item.title: Java error? Help please its the only thing that I need help with

item.description:
@aronscape wrote:

large your memory then it should work.
